EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Inertial Navigation for Surveying/Mapping Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Portal <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> | View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Forward to a friend <[[{{system.forwardToFriendLink}}]]>
LIVE WEBINAR How inertial navigation and post-processing make surveying/mapping more profitable
Presenter: Jon Thorland | HGuide Growth Leader
Register Now <[[https://www.geo-week.com/webinars/how-inertial-navigation-and-post-processing-make-surveying]]> {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Companies engaged in using LiDAR for mapping need flexibility and ease of use to improve operational efficiencies.
This webinar will discuss the range of solutions that Honeywell can offer to maximize productivity for LiDAR mappers whether by land, air or sea.
We hope to see you there,
The HGuide Support Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]>
